update users set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position_id = #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT users.id, users.realname, departments.department FROM users INNER JOIN departments ON departments.id = users.department_id WHERE users.id != #{id} ORDER BY users.department_id
